# --- CURL
set (CURL_INC_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/include)
add_library (CURL SHARED IMPORTED GLOBAL)

set_property (TARGET CURL PROPERTY IMPORTED_IMPLIB_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/lib/libcurl.lib)
set_property (TARGET CURL PROPERTY IMPORTED_IMPLIB_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/lib/libcurl.lib)

set_property (TARGET CURL PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/lib/libcurl.dll)
set_property (TARGET CURL PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/lib/libcurl.dll)
set_property (TARGET CURL PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION_RELEASE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/lib/zlib1.dll)
set_property (TARGET CURL PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION_DEBUG ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/curl/lib/zlib1.dll)

target_include_directories (CURL INTERFACE ${CURL_INC_DIR})
